    • updateScoresStatistics

      public void updateScoresStatistics(int score, int creditBetted)
      updateScoresStatistics Takes score 8 and 9 and groups it with score 7. Score 11 and 10 become score 9 and 8 respectively. After that updates the number of rounds, the total bets and the array with the sum of each group of scores
      Parameters:
      score -
      bet -
